title: SSG Splash Art Quick fix
body: So I was working on an Edit (Hence why the colors are so different) when I began noticing something was really off about Ezreal’s face in the new SSG splash art. At first glance, it’s nothing too big, but once you make up for the anatomical errors its when you realize how misshapen the left eye, jaw and nose are. I’m a newbie at photoshop so pardon the bad quality, but I tried my best to emulate his base splash art’s face structure.What do you guys think, should hey change it? Arcade suffers the same problem...

replies.body: they are both not an accurate portrayal of {{champion:81}}
His neck could be thinned a tiny bit to compensate for the thinner chin, but it looks pretty good.

the edit looks fine but because his chin is so big in the before pic you have to make his neck smaller(shorter) the only thing that is wrong with the picture, looks more like an elf-like achetype {{champion:40}} and her long neck
